choices: Dark begins teaching them something new
Miley sees one of her friends
1.content:
Mix means that their human forms and animal forms can be in the same story. Scott is a fox.
Maisie and Scott are tow really close friends. They often stay secluded from other people because of their powers. Dark is their friend who helps them with this problem. He is very mysterious and tends to come in and out at random. Miley has a very cheerful attitude and is very friendly. Scott is mysterious like Dark, but he can be friendly. However he is cautious with new people that he meets and doesn't seem approachable alot of the time. So without furthe ado let's start this story.

Miley was helping Scott release energy in small amounts. They were out in a field next to a nearby cave. Dark comes and joins the training.
Dark: So how is it going.
Miley: Really well I think we are ready for the next step.
Dark: Great but where is Scott.
Scott: (his eyes are glowing white)
Dark: Oh I see he still in his second phase.
Miley: Let me snap him out of it. (walks to him) Scott he is here.
Scott: (turns his head)
Miley: (waves her hand in front of his face)
Scott: (his eyes stop glowing) Oh sorry I was scanning again.

What happens next?
1.title: Scott and Miley: It begins

choices: Who is Scott trying to meet later
Dark sees one of his friends
Scott goes back into the cave
11.content:
Continue
Scott: Oh sorry I was scanning again.
Miley: You know that you are not infected with parasites so why scan for them.
Scott: I am kind of addicted to it.
Dark: So do you want to go into the village for another lesson on small talk.
Miley: Sure but I think I can handle it on my own.
Scott: I don't know I kind of need to meet ...well you know.

What happens next?
11.title: What was Scott really doing

13.content: Then Miley saw her Royal friend from the Sunshines but was a Shadow after Betrayal, Hypon the Night-Blood Wolf. Hypon: Hello Dark. I see your still training, Scott. Dark: Hypon, yes, we are helping him. Hypon: I'm sorry I couldnt join to help you but Lighting had to be killed after he killed my team.
13.title: The Last of His Kind......

132.content:
Continue
Tahairah and Mytar.
Hypon: Lightning killed my team. Only five of us remain.
Dark: (senses movement) I hear that you brought your friend.
Hypon: Yeah I did.
Tahairah appears
Tahairah: Hey what's up?
Dark: You're a vampire.
Scott: Dark, she is a good vampire.
Hypon: Sorry I know you haven't met.
Tahairah: What? He doesn't like me? I thought your friends were nice.
Hypon: No, Dark doesn't trust them.
Dark: Yeah basically I haven't had a good experience with vampires. It's not you it's me.
Hypon: So introduce yourself.
Taiahairah: Well my name is Tahairah and who are you guys?
Miley: Miley the hedgehog or Hedger.
Scott: I'm Scott. (gives a serious look)
Suddenly a black and red lizard with a long tail appears. (can turn invisible. Has claws and can be a very aggressive fighter)
?: (creepily says) Hello.
Hypon: (startled) Whoa! who is there.
Dark: Mytar I know it's you.
Mytar: You always spoil the surprise.

What happens next?
132.title: Tahairah (Hypon's Vamprie friend) Comes in

1321.content: Hypon: (kisses Tahairih on lips but Tarairah pushs him away) Tarairah: Hypon, we talked about this. Hypon: I know, I know. You dont want to change me into a vamprie.
1321.title: Continue

13211.content:
Continue
Hypon and Tahairah.
Tahairah: You told me that you were immune.
Hypon: Yeah but why?
Tahairah: You know why.
Hypon: Okay well I will respect your decision.
Mortar: So Tahairah do you know of the rebel clan.
Tahairah: What no. Who are you anyway?
Mortar: I am Mortar (or Mytar). I am known as a Shadow rebel. (one that converted from the Shadow clan)
Dark: We go way back.
Tahairah: I see.
Scott: I thought you were the Sunshine Queen.
Tahairah: No I am the princess. I will be queen someday.
Miley: So when did you turn into vampire.
Tahairah: I am a mix. I am a vampire and a hedgehog.

What happens next?
13211.title: Continue

132111.content: Hypon: And I still love you the same. But you know your going to have to change me into a vampire soon, Tahairih. Tahairih: I know, but not now. You still got a life to live, and I dont want to mess it up.
132111.title: Continue

1321111.content:
Continue
Dark and Tahairah.
Dark: You know that's illegal.
Tahairah: It is? Since when?
Dark: Well unless it's ot of self defense but I don't like vampires.

What happens next?
1321111.title: Continue

13211111.content: Hypon: Dark, I made the deal with her. Legal or Illegal. She's going to do it, no matter what you say. I love her and She loves me. And you cant stop her nor me on going thru with it.
13211111.title: Continue

132111111.content:
Continue
Dark and Hypon
Dark: I don't want to arrest you and make you work.
Tahairah: I will never bite you Hypon. I would rather burn in the sun...not literally.
Hypon: But I love you.
Tahairah: And I love you just the way you are. You don't have to be a vampire.
Dark: You know. I will let you two deal with your own situation. (leaves)
Hypon: What?

What happens next?
132111111.title: Continue

1321111111.content: Hypon: Tahairah. The only way you can turn me into a vampire is when I'm close to death.
1321111111.title: Continue

13211111111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Tahairah.
Tahairah: I really don't want to turn you into a vampire. I would rather become a mortal bat again.
Hypon: Fine I guess we were not meant to be.
Tahairah: Hypon, I didn't mean to hurt you. However I need you to do me a favor.
Hypon: What is it?
Tahairah: The Sunshine city has been invaded.

What happens next?
13211111111.title: Continue

132111111111.content: After Tahairiah said these words, Hypon's eyes turned black and he ran towards the city, destorying any enemies in his way.
132111111111.title: Continue

choices: Hypon tries to go into his demon form again but couldn't
1321111111111.content:
Continue
Hypon's despair.
Hypon became enraged and started destroying anything that he could touch. Most of the citizens were able to dodge his attacks but some perished from falling debris. Hypon began to run around when suddenly he froze and fell to the ground. He was paralyzed and didn't know why. Suddenly a white flash came by and Hypon was knocked out.
Later Hypon woke up in a dark prison with glowing force fields. He didn't know where he was or how anyone managed to capture him when he was in his demon form but he knew that it wasn't good.

What happens next?
1321111111111.title: Continue

choices: Someone throws a rock through the window
13211111111111.content: Hypon: Ace, is that you. Ace: Yes, Prince, It's me.
13211111111111.title: Hypon sees another prisoner

132111111111111.content:
Continue
They were in a windowless prison
Hypon and Ace
Hypon: Where am I?
Ace: You are in Central city prison.
Hypon: What? How did I get here? I didn't do anything.
Ace: Are you sure. I heard you were threatening other creatures' lives.
Hypon: Well I was angry and why are you here?
Ace: I got in a dispute with Acura. My release date is supposed to be today.
Hypon: Oh well how long am I going to be here.
Ace: Depends on the severity of your crime. I wouldn't try escaping though.
Hypon: Why is it hard.
Ace: No its almost impossible but someone like you can find a way. I was only here a week though.

What happens next?
132111111111111.title: Continue

1321111111111111.content: Hypon: Hmph. Wait, you said Central City? Ace: Yes. Hypon: The Warden knows me and I used to be a guard here. And plus Mum will get me out. Ace: Not this time, Hypon. But maybe the warden, I'm not sure.
1321111111111111.title: Continue

13211111111111111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Ace
Hypon: Why aren't you?
Ace: Because the warden was the one that brought you here.
Hypon: What I thought it was one of the guards.
Ace: All I know is that you will really have to have a good reason for him to let you out early.
Hypon: Maybe but why can't my mum get me out.
Ace: As a messenger I can only tell you what she told me, she said that you need to learn how to control yourself.
Hypon: Whatever I just need to get out of here.

What happens next?
13211111111111111.title: Continue

132111111111111112.content: Hypon: She's the only reason I lost contorl, I wanted to protect her and the kingdom. But I didnt want to hurt anyone else expect the invaders. (starts to tear up and sits on the bed) If I have to rot in here because of my actions, I only have myself to blame.
132111111111111112.title: Continue

choices: They go outside and Tahairah was there
1321111111111111121.content:
Continue
Ace and Hypon
Ace: Well don't lose all hope. Maybe I can convince the warden to let you go...what did you do anyway.
Hypon: I went onto town and destroyed some buildings. I didn't intend to hurt anyone.
Ace: Okay maybe when the warden gets here I can get you to come out with me. After all this is my last day here.
Suddenly the warden appears.
Warden: Hello there fellow "friends".
Ace: Hey um can I talk to you.
Warden: What's up? You know that you can leave any time.
Ace: I know...just finished packing, but I need to ask you a question. Can Hypon be released with me?
Warden: (looks at him with a straight face)
Hypon: (thinking) "Well he at least tried."
Warden: (opens the cell) I can let him go with you but you are required to go to civil court.
Ace: Okay that's fair. (leaves)
Hypon: Can I go?
Warden: Yes but you will be scheduled to meet with the judge within a week. Better not be late.

What happens next?
1321111111111111121.title: Continue

13211111111111111211.content: A few days later, at the civil court, Hypon was already in the courtroom to defend him against the procuster.
13211111111111111211.title: Continue

132111111111111112111.content:
Continue
Ace arrives.
Hypon: Where have you been! I have been waiting here for hours.
Ace: The warden said he would schedule a session in about a week. I am here to confirm the appointment.
Hypon: So I came here early for nothing.
Ace: Yeah have you seen the judge anywhere?
Hypon: No I thought this was the waiting room.
Ace: Hypon, relax you are in good hands. We got this.
Hypon: So when are we really scheduled?
Ace: Two days from now at around 3 o'clock.
Hypon: Cool.
Ace: Come with me. I will show you the collected evidence.

What happens next?
132111111111111112111.title: Continue

1321111111111111121112.content: Judge: Well, this is Hypon. Hypon: Hello Judge. Judge: I thought you would be in prison, but I guess wrong. Hypon: I thought that too, but I have no memory of what happened earlier this week.
1321111111111111121112.title: the judge appears

13211111111111111211121.content:
Continue
Hypon's trial.
Hypon: I have no memory of what I did earlier this week.
Judge: We can discuss this on your day. Now please go, there is another trial waiting.
Ace: Come on we will deal with this in a couple of days.
Hypon: Okay fine.
They walk out.
Tahairah comes.
Tahairah: Hypon? What are you doing here. I thought you were in prison.
Hypon: I am technically. I will have to go to court before any decisions upon my innocence will be made.

What happens next?
13211111111111111211121.title: Continue

132111111111111112111212.content: Hypon was again in the courtroom earlier. Waiting on the his lawyer to appear. And Ace to help him and probobly Tarahaih and his mum also to defend him. The procusser kept on saying bad things at Hypon, for he was there earlier as well.
132111111111111112111212.title: Skip to the appointment

1321111111111111121112121.content:
Continue
Hypon's trial.
The prosecutor stood there in silence when the judge entered. Ace and Hypon stood there in the front.
Judge: (banging a hammer) Order!
The crowd silenced.
After the proceedings court was now in session.
Judge: Now, Hypon what's the case.
Hypon: I wish to be set free from jail after being arrested for threatening the lives of others. (thinking) "I hope Ace has something to prove my innocence."
Judge: Since you approve of this show me your case, Mr.Brightwing. (Ace)
Ace: Well as it shows on record that Hypon has been in jail before. I want to present this to over rule his original punishment. (shows the judge some papers)
Judge: (Looks through the papers)
Ace: As you see Hypon has been accused several times for crimes he didn't do but he does have demon powers which do put him at risk.
Judge: Alright, side two you may proceed.
Prosecutor: Well Hypon does have legal rights to be able to wield such abilities, but he has been reported carelessly destroying property and risking innocent people's lives. His paper work proves that.
Judge: (looks at those papers) It appears here that Hypon has been around for quite awhile however I will need a witness to get more information.

What happens next?
1321111111111111121112121.title: Continue

13211111111111111211121212.content: Hypon: (in Mind) There were no witnesses but the Warren saw me leave the area. But If I can, with the Judge's permission, I could bring back the people I "accidently" killed. I wish that I had more time to mediate and give me more self-control.
13211111111111111211121212.title: Hypon's point of view.

choices: Someone doesn't agree with the decision
132111111111111112111212121.content:
Continue
Hypon trial.
Hypon: (thinking) " I need more time."
Tahairah was brought to the floor.
Officer: So you claim to know of Hypon's daily duties?
Tahairah: Yes.
After the proceedings. Tahairah proclaimed Hypon innocent.
Judge: So you say that you caused Hypon to do those things.
Tahairah: Well not directly.
Tahairah goes back to her seat.
The judge looks at all of his paper work and notes. He looks up.
Judge: It appears to me that everything said about Hypon and his case is true. So let me ask this, Hypon, do you believe you deserve to be set free?
Hypon: Well I can heal and bring back everyone that I ...
Judge: (interrupts) Answer the question. All I need is a yes or a no.
Hypon: Yes your honor.
Judge: Well since there is nothing more to talk about I will say that you are free on the account of your friend. (bangs hammer) Sessions are now closed.
Everyone leaves.
Hypon: (smiles) Well that was close.
Ace: Yeah. (jokingly) You owe me one.
Hypon: (laughs) I promise I will make it up to you. So what now.
Ace: I am going back to Sunshine city. What about you?
Hypon: I am going to make things right.

What happens next?
132111111111111112111212121.title: Continue

1321111111111111121112121211.content: Hypon walks out of the city and to where he slaughtered the innocent people. Hypon then sat down and started to chanted in an ancient langugue. Then bluidings started rebluid themsleves and people started to heal and awaken from thier "slumber"
1321111111111111121112121211.title: Continue

13211111111111111211121212111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Prancer. (a short-tempered lizard with sharp claws and quick reflexes. Can be very aggressive)
Hypon: Well that takes care of that. (turns around only to get clawed in the face) Ah!
? : Hey remember me!
Hypon: (heals his scratched eye) Who are you?
? : Prancer. I guess your memory was wiped out after all.
Hypon: What are you talking about? I never saw you in my life.
Prancer: I don't have to explain anything to you.

What happens next?
13211111111111111211121212111.title: Continue

132111111111111112111212121112.content: Kura: Prancer, get away from him! Prancer: Never. Hypon attacks Prancer and rips part of his claws.
132111111111111112111212121112.title: Kura appears

1321111111111111121112121211121.content:
Continue
Prancer and Hypon.
Prancer: (hisses) (grabs Hypon and throws him on the ground)
Kura: (throws a bomb at Prancer)
Prancer: (gets blown back)
Hypon: (gets up)

What happens next?
1321111111111111121112121211121.title: Continue

13211111111111111211121212111211.content: The Lizard runs off. Kura runs over to Hypon.
13211111111111111211121212111211.title: Continue

132111111111111112111212121112111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Kura
Hypon: Who was that guy?
Kura: (stops next to Hypon) He is just someone that doesn't know how to maintain peace.
Hypon: Well that's enough excitement for one day.
Kura: So how was your day?
Hypon: Well I went to jail and then to court and now I am here, and how about you?
Kura: Well I was running missions all day. Just a typical day for me.
Hypon: Ineteresting.
Kura: So why were you in jail?

What happens next?
132111111111111112111212121112111.title: Continue

1321111111111111121112121211121111.content: (The village and all it people were all fixed and back to the way it was) Hypon: Kura, I destoryed this village and its people. But It was an accident.
1321111111111111121112121211121111.title: Continue

13211111111111111211121212111211111.content:
Continue
Kura and Hypon
Kura: I understand. I once had a friend just like you.
Hypon: Really?
Kura: Yeah but he disappeared long ago.

What happens next?
13211111111111111211121212111211111.title: Continue

132111111111111112111212121112111111.content: Hypon: Oh. Kura, do you mind if I stay in the Cave of Wonders? I want to have time to find some inner peace. I want to control my other forms.
132111111111111112111212121112111111.title: Continue

1321111111111111121112121211121111112.content:
Continue
Kura and Hypon
Kura: No it's a public place, but Scott is in there meditating.
Hypon: Oh okay.

What happens next?
1321111111111111121112121211121111112.title: No

13211111111111111211121212111211111121.content: Hypon: Then What happened to your clan? I thought they lived in there? Did you guys move?
13211111111111111211121212111211111121.title: Continue

132111111111111112111212121112111111211.content:
Continue
Hypon and Kura
Kura: No we live by the caverns remember?
Hypon: Oh I wasn't aware.
Kura: There are some Shadows that live there though. It's not a claimed territory though.

What happens next?
132111111111111112111212121112111111211.title: Continue

1321111111111111121112121211121111112111.content: Hypon: It's been too long since I last whent there. But I still need a place to mediate, Kura, and That place is so peaceful, the waterfall and the Crystal Lake.
1321111111111111121112121211121111112111.title: Continue

132111111111112.content:
Continue
Hypon and Ace.
A rock flies through the a small bullet proof window of the prison.
Hypon: Whoa! Now I can escape. (climbs the wall and peers through the window)
There was a prisoner on the other side and he didn't look very happy to see Hypon.
? : If you get over here I will tear you apart!
Hypon: You don't know who you are talking to.
?: (claws himself up the wall) Who do you think you are?
Hypon: Prince Hypon and you are?
?: Prancer. What would a prince like you be doing here?
Hypon: I went on a rampage. Why are you here?
Prancer: Got caught attempting to kill someone.
Hypon: Oh.

What happens next?
132111111111112.title: Someone throws a rock through the window

1322.content:
Continue
Hypon and Midnight
Hypon: Who are you?
Mytar: My name is Mytar (or Mortar). I am a Shadow rebel and you are?
Hypon: Prince Hypon I am a Night-blood.
Tahairah: My name is Tahairah.
Scott: You already know Miley and Me.
Mortar: Yes I almost took your life.
Miley: So what brings you here?
Mytar: Just decided to come by.
Suddenly a black-furred hedgehog with yellow eyes appears. (can read dreams and teleport. Very mystical and mysterious. Can be a aggressive fighter)
?: Hello there.
Hypon: Who are you?
?: I am Midnight. Mortar's friend and you are?
Hypon: I am Hypon.

What happens next?
1322.title: Mytar's friend appears

13221.content: Hypon: Midnight...Midnight.... Your name rings in my head but I cant remember how.
13221.title: Continue

132211.content:
Continue
Hypon and Midnight.
Midnight: Hypon? Wait I remember you. You were the Night-blood that tried to kill me.
Hypon: Yeah ...wait I don't remember that but I remember someone like you trying to corrupt my people.
Mortar: Guys let's leave the past behind us. We agreed to never speak of this again.
Hypon: What You know about us too.
Mytar: All too well.

What happens next?
132211.title: They were old rivials

1322111.content: Hypon: Then what do you know about me?
1322111.title: Continue

13221112.content:
Continue
Mortar and Hypon
Mortar: Well if you couldn't tell already, I am from Darkite descent.
Hypon: Yeah you look like one. So what do you know about me?
Mytar: I know very little about you but I know that I was in Darkite prison with you. You always went against the grain if you know what I mean.
Hypon: Yeah Darkites are crazy...no offense.
Mortar: None taken. I agree.
Midnight: Hey I do remember now. You were always the one the guards yelled at, but you unfortunately killed my brother!
Hypon: I never did such thing and you captured my sister.
Mortar: You have a sister?
Hypon: Yes I do.

What happens next?
13221112.title: When he was Darkite

132211121.content: Hypon: Yes, a sister. Tabithia. She's almost like me in every way. She could make you love crazy and she could killed you.
132211121.title: Continue

1322111211.content:
Continue
Hypon and Mortar
Hypon: Yes and she could kill you.
Mortar: (irritated) You don't know me then. I am quite a skilled fighter.
Hypon: So is she.
Midnight: Then let's hear it from her but she is obviously not here.
Hypon: Wow you are slow.
Mortar: (puts his claws out and hisses) I should kill you now but I am no longer a Darkite.
Midnight: Yeah no one talks to us like that besides what did we do to you?
Hypon: Stole my sister and destroyed my family. My demon form shouldn't be challenged.
Mortar: You don't know this but I have a demon.
Midnight: So do I.
Hypon: Fine let's test them out.

What happens next?
1322111211.title: Continue

13221112111.content: ???: (slutly tone) Hello Boys. Hypon: Tabithia, cut it out, they got girls.... I think. Tabithia: Your no fun, Brother. Hypon: Mum would side with me. And she didnt want you be this way. Dad was right though, we were meant to be assassins.
13221112111.title: Continue

132211121111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Tabitha
Hypon: Dad was right we ...wait how are you here?
Tabitha: I came with Kit. (gray cat)
Mortar: So Midnight didn't capture your sister.
Hypon: Yeah...what happened to you?
Tabitha: I told you that I was going to be on a mission with Kit for awhile. I am sorry, I didn't mean for this to be such a shocker.

What happens next?
132211121111.title: Continue

1322111211111.content:
Continue
Hypon and Tabitha
Hypon: So they didn't capture you.
Midnight: But you still killed my brother and now you have to pay. (generates a strange energy and attacks Hypon)
Hypon: (blocks it with ease) Now wait I didn't do anything.
Midnight: (slaps Hypon in the face) Then prove yourself.
Hypon: That was a bad idea. (eyes glow)
Mytar: (claws Midnight) Stop this now!
Tabitha: (holds her brother back) You too.
Midnight: (wipes the blood from his face) So you too.
Mortar: Wheter or not he killed your brother doesn't matter anymore. Your anger does.

What happens next?
1322111211111.title: Continue

13221112111112.content: Paul: Hey ya'll. Hypon: See, Midnight. I didnt kill your brother.
13221112111112.title: Midnight's brother comes

132211121111121.content:
Continue
Midnight and Hypon
Midnight: That's not my brother. (sees a red hedgehog with a long tail) What?
Hypon: I wasn't talking about him. I was talking about the other hedgehog.
Midnight: (runs past Paul and Hypon)
Hypon: Paul what are you doing here?
Paul: I had some news for you.

What happens next?
132211121111121.title: Continue

15.content:
First before we continue is Miley a human?
So something random occurs.
Scott: (disappears)
Miley: Watch out for the moon.
Dark: What moon?
Miley: Never mind.
Dark: Question mark?

What happens next?
15.title: Something random

info.brief_description: This is a story about Scott and Miley and their adventures
info.description:
First the rules
1.) No cursing
2.) No sex or nudity
3.) No death of main characters (violence is allowed)
4.) Characters can be added as long as they make sense in the story.
5.) Make sure chapters have at least three descriptive sentences
6.) Have fun

Scott is a fox with force powers. Miley is a hedgehog with the same powers as Scott except she has the ability to teleport as well as more experience.Scott and Miley can also be humans and yes they can mix.
